_comments.description: Agent Configuration - Control all behavior from this single file

query_processing.gemini_model: String - Gemini model to use (gemini-2.0-flash, gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20, etc.)

timpark_payment.use_timpark_payment: true/false - Enable/disable TimPark payment automation tool
timpark_payment.gemini_model: String - Gemini model for intent analysis (gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20 recommended)
timpark_payment.gemini_temperature: 0.1-1.0 - Controls creativity for intent analysis (0.1=focused for accuracy)
timpark_payment.gemini_max_tokens: 500-2000 - Max tokens for intent analysis response

output.save_to_file: true/false - Save TimPark tool results to separate file

web_search.city_hint: String - Romanian city for search context (timisoara, bucuresti, cluj, etc.)

search_date_range.search_after_date: String - Format: M/D/YYYY - Content published after this date
search_date_range.search_before_date: String - Format: M/D/YYYY - Content published before this date

trusted_sites_search.use_trusted_sites_search: true/false - Enable/disable trusted Romanian sites search with domain filtering

gemini_domain_selection.gemini_max_tokens: 500-3000 - Max tokens for domain selection response
gemini_domain_selection.gemini_model: String - Gemini model for domain selection (gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20 recommended)

perplexity_filtered_search.perplexity_temperature: 0.0-1.0 - Controls randomness in filtered search results
perplexity_filtered_search.perplexity_max_tokens: 5000-15000 - Maximum response length for filtered search
perplexity_filtered_search.city_hint: String - Romanian city context (timisoara, bucuresti, cluj, etc.)
perplexity_filtered_search.search_context_size: low/medium/high - Breadth of filtered search results
perplexity_filtered_search.search_after_date: String - Format: M/D/YYYY - Content published after this date
perplexity_filtered_search.search_before_date: String - Format: M/D/YYYY - Content published before this date

output.save_to_file: true/false - Save trusted sites search results to separate file

final_response_generation.use_final_response_generation: true/false - Enable/disable final response synthesis using Gemini 2.5 Flash
final_response_generation.gemini_model: String - Gemini model for final synthesis (gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20 recommended)
final_response_generation.gemini_temperature: 0.1-1.0 - Controls creativity for final response (0.1=focused, factual)
final_response_generation.gemini_max_tokens: 10000-20000 - Max tokens for final synthesized response

rag_context.use_rag_context: true/false - Enable/disable RAG context integration from local knowledge files
rag_context.rag_domains: Array of strings - Domain names to check for RAG context files (e.g., ['dfmt.ro', 'timpark.ro'])
rag_context.rag_context_path: String - Relative path from src/ to RAG context files directory (default: 'rag_context')

output.save_to_file: true/false - Save final synthesized response to separate file

output.output_folder: String - Relative path from src/ or absolute path
output.include_reformulated_query: true/false - Save reformulated query to separate file

file_naming.use_config_name: true/false - Use config name vs question for filename

current_test.question: String - Default question to process if none provided
current_test.config_name: String - Config identifier for file naming

examples.city_hints: timisoara, bucuresti, cluj, constanta, brasov, iasi
examples.trusted_sites_workflow: Step 1: Gemini selects relevant Romanian government domains -> Step 2: Perplexity searches only those domains
examples.trusted_sites_benefits: More accurate, official information from government sources with proper citations
examples.final_response_workflow: Step 4: Gemini 2.5 Flash synthesizes all search results into comprehensive final answer
examples.final_response_benefits: Single coherent response avoiding redundancy, prioritizing official sources, formatted as actionable instructions
examples.rag_context_workflow: When enabled and matching domains are selected, corresponding RAG context files are automatically loaded and integrated
examples.rag_context_benefits: Enhanced accuracy with detailed local knowledge, up-to-date regulations, and domain-specific information
examples.rag_context_examples: Enable: 'use_rag_context': true; Add domains: 'rag_domains': ['dfmt.ro', 'timpark.ro']; Custom path: 'rag_context_path': 'my_contexts'
examples.timpark_payment_workflow: Step 1: Gemini analyzes user intent for parking payment -> Step 2: If payment intent detected for Timisoara, executes automation script
examples.timpark_payment_benefits: Automated parking payment for Timisoara with smart intent detection, supports 30min-12h durations
examples.timpark_payment_examples: Enable: 'use_timpark_payment': true; Queries: 'plateste parcarea 2 ore', 'achita parcarea in centru'
